text.steamTitle_success_add:
Steam account connected successfully!
Now you can use /link command.
text.steamTitle_success_update:
Steam account updated successfully!
Now you can use /link command.
text.steamTitle_error_incorrect: Error! Incorrect URL or code has expired.
text.steamTitle_error_no_steam: Error! Your Discord account has not Steam account integration.
text.steamDescription_error_incorrect: Use /connect command again to link Steam account to Civ6Bot.
text.steamDescription_error_unknown: Try again later or notify developers about this problem.
text.steamDescription_error_no_steam: Open Discord => Settings => Integrations, add your Steam account and try again.
